decks.notes: This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with cheap and aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter. The deck utilizes efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to control the board and deal direct damage to the opponent. Expressive Iteration and Mishra's Bauble help dig for more threats and keep the pressure on. Mutagenic Growth and Unholy Heat provide additional combat tricks and removal. The deck aims to win the game quickly by attacking relentlessly and finishing off opponents with direct damage spells.

The core idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy, utilizing a combination of efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco, along with powerful spells like Tribal Flames and Lightning Bolt. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support and protection for your creatures, while cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury add a big threat to the board. Stubborn Denial helps to protect your key cards and maintain pressure on the opponent, making it difficult for them to stabilize.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent, using cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Goblin Bombardment to pressure their life total. It also includes powerful planeswalkers like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to generate value and close out the game. The deck runs a low mana curve and efficient removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm to control the board while maintaining pressure. Overall, the strategy is to be proactive, dealing damage quickly and efficiently to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on disrupting opponents through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. By using cards like Force of Negation, Prismatic Ending, and Wrath of the Skies, the deck can control the board and prevent opponents from executing their game plan. Additionally, cards like Nulldrifter and Tune the Narrative provide card advantage and filtering, ensuring the player has the resources they need to outlast their opponent. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to close out games once the opponent has been sufficiently controlled.

The deck focuses on assembling the Allosaurus Rider combo by using Neoform and Eldritch Evolution to search for key pieces like Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant and Griselbrand. Glittering Wish and Consign to Memory provide additional tutoring options, while Pact of Negation ensures protection during crucial turns. The deck also includes support cards like Disciple of Freyalise to ramp and Eladamri's Call for creature searching. The inclusion of Planar Genesis and Meticulous Archive allows for graveyard recursion and card advantage, making the deck versatile and resilient in various matchups.

This deck focuses on quickly disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek while applying pressure through efficient creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Nethergoyf. It also utilizes powerful removal spells like Fatal Push and Kozilek's Command to control the board. The deck takes advantage of a mono-black mana base and includes utility lands like Ifnir Deadlands and Urza's Saga to support its aggressive strategy. Additionally, cards like Mishra's Bauble and Emperor of Bones provide additional value and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize artifacts and Eldrazi creatures to control the board and generate card advantage. By using cards like Surge Node, Mystic Forge, and Karn, the Great Creator, the deck is able to ramp up mana production and play powerful threats like Ugin, the Eye of the Storms and Glaring Fleshraker. Additionally, cards like Devourer of Destiny and Coretapper provide additional synergy with the artifact-heavy strategy. Overall, the goal is to out-value the opponent and control the game until victory is achieved.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize the Ruby Medallion and rituals to generate mana quickly, allowing for explosive plays with cards like Reckless Impulse and Grapeshot. The deck also aims to cycle through the library efficiently with Wrenn's Resolve and Past in Flames, while leveraging Ral, Monsoon Mage's abilities to control the board and finish off opponents. The inclusion of wish cards adds versatility and flexibility to the combo strategy, making it a formidable force in Modern 1 vs 1 gameplay.

This deck focuses on assembling a wide variety of creatures to create powerful combos and synergies, utilizing cards like Green Sun's Zenith to search for key creatures at the right time. Grist, the Hunger Tide and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician are central to the deck's strategy, allowing for removal, card draw, and creature generation. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Malevolent Rumble to control the board and disrupt opponent's strategies. With a toolbox approach, this deck aims to adapt to different situations and outmaneuver opponents with a versatile creature-based combo strategy.

The deck focuses on assembling the Allosaurus Combo, which involves using Neoform and Eldritch Evolution to tutor for and cheat out Allosaurus Rider onto the battlefield. This creature is then buffed by Xenagos, God of Revels to deal lethal damage to the opponent. The deck also includes ways to protect the combo with Pact of Negation and Chancellor of the Annex, as well as ways to search for pieces with Eladamri's Call and Glittering Wish. The goal is to quickly and efficiently combo off to win the game.

This aggro deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent using efficient creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, backed up by a variety of burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Lava Spike, and Rift Bolt. The deck also includes ways to protect its creatures and prevent lifegain with cards like Boros Charm, Skullcrack, and Lightning Helix. The mana base is carefully optimized to ensure a consistent flow of damage output, with cards like Sunbaked Canyon and Inspiring Vantage providing additional versatility and speed.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling a combination of cards to generate card advantage and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By using cards like The Underworld Cookbook and Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar, along with sacrifice outlets like Ovalchase Daredevil and Psychic Frog, the deck aims to pressure the opponent while controlling the board. Additionally, utilizing cards like Mox Opal and Monument to Endurance allows for explosive starts and resilient threats. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Metallic Rebuke to further disrupt the opponent's strategy.
